targets.expr:
predict_linear(
  sum(
  (
    max by (compute_host, resource, availability_zone) (
      cortex_total_capacity_per_host{
        resource="cpu",
        availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
        compute_host=~"$compute_host",
        hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family",
        workload_type="general-purpose",
        cpu_architecture="sapphire-rapids",
        enabled="true"
      }
    )
    *
    on(compute_host, resource, availability_zone)
    (
      1 - max by (compute_host, resource, availability_zone) (
        cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{
          resource="cpu",
          availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
          compute_host=~"$compute_host",
          hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family",
          workload_type="general-purpose",
          cpu_architecture="sapphire-rapids",
          enabled="true"
        } / 100
      )
    )
  )
)[1d:]
, 86400) / 
sum(
  max by (compute_host) (
    cortex_total_capacity_per_host{
      resource="cpu",
      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family",
      workload_type="general-purpose",
      cpu_architecture="sapphire-rapids",
      enabled="true"
    }
  )
)

max by (compute_host, total, running_vms, enabled, disabled_reason, workload_type, availability_zone, cpu_architecture, hypervisor_family) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="cpu", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family", workload_type="general-purpose", cpu_architecture="sapphire-rapids"}) / 100

max by (compute_host, total, running_vms, enabled, disabled_reason, workload_type, availability_zone, cpu_architecture, hypervisor_family) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="ram", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family", workload_type="general-purpose", cpu_architecture="sapphire-rapids"}) / 100

max by (compute_host, total, running_vms, enabled, disabled_reason, workload_type, availability_zone, cpu_architecture, hypervisor_family) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="disk", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family", workload_type="general-purpose", cpu_architecture="sapphire-rapids"}) / 100

sum by (compute_host) (cortex_total_capacity_per_host{resource="cpu", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family",workload_type="general-purpose", cpu_architecture="sapphire-rapids" }) / 
count by (compute_host) (cortex_total_capacity_per_host{resource="cpu", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family",workload_type="general-purpose", cpu_architecture="sapphire-rapids" })

sum by (compute_host) (cortex_total_capacity_per_host{resource="ram", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family",workload_type="general-purpose", cpu_architecture="sapphire-rapids" }) / 
count by (compute_host) (cortex_total_capacity_per_host{resource="ram", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family",workload_type="general-purpose", cpu_architecture="sapphire-rapids" })
